name: .410 bore conversion kit
description: This kit is used to convert a shotgun or 7.62x39mm, .223, .308 or M1926 SRC rifle to the lightweight .410 shotgun bore.  The conversion results in a slight reduction to accuracy.

name: SSRA Pack
description: A cardboard box containing a genuine Cannalan SSRA and several magazines. Ammunition and accessories  available separately. Disassemble to unpack and enjoy.

name: QuickFire Shotgun Pack
description: A cardboard box containing a genuine Cannalan SSRA, several QFS magazines, and the parts required to convert the SSRA to a QFS. Ammunition and accessories  available separately. Disassemble to unpack and enjoy.

name: M1926 SRC Can
description: A large metal can containing 1200 rounds of war surplus M1926 SRC ammunition. Disassemble to unpack and enjoy.
